meanings.definition: A Christian liturgical prayer for mercy
meanings.sent1: During the church service, the congregation sang the kyrie together.
meanings.sent2: The priest led the kyrie to ask for forgiveness and mercy.
meanings.sent3: The kyrie was so heartfelt that even the birds outside seemed to listen.
meanings.sent4: Her whispered kyrie echoed through the empty chapel, seeking solace.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the kyrie filled the room, carrying the plea for mercy.

meanings.definition: A musical setting of the Kyrie eleison
meanings.sent1: The choir rehearsed the kyrie for the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent2: The orchestra played the kyrie beautifully during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The kyrie melody was so catchy, it stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: As the kyrie played, it felt like a soothing balm for the soul.
meanings.sent5: The haunting notes of the kyrie lingered in the air, enchanting all who listened.
